meaningMnemonic:
If you take the <kanji>time</kanji> and <kanji>carve</kanji> it onto a <kanji>surface</kanji>, then you've made a <vocabulary>timetable</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>schedule</vocabulary>.

時刻表 generally refers to a timetable or schedule for transportation, such as trains, buses, or flights.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
